titles.title: Stop Foreign Interference in Ballot Measures Act
Stop Foreign Interference in Ballot Measures Act
A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit contributions and donations by foreign nationals in connection with State or local ballot initiatives or referenda.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary:
Stop Foreign Interference in Ballot Measures Act
This bill prohibits contributions or donations by foreign nationals in connection with state or local ballot initiatives or referenda.
